sqlMap.select: SELECT 'inetOrgPerson' objectClass, pers."ID" as externalid, pers."MAIL", pers."SN", pers."CN", pers."DESCRIPTION", pers."TELEPHONENUMBER" FROM testdata pers WHERE pers."ID" LIKE #externalid#
SELECT pers."ID" AS externalid FROM testdata pers
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO testdata ( ID , MAIL , MAIL_LOWER , LAST_UPDATE , SN , CN , DESCRIPTION , TELEPHONENUMBER ) VALUES ( #externalid# , #mail# , LCASE(#mail#) , NOW() , #sn# , #cn# , #description# , #telephonenumber# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE testdata SET ID = #externalid#, MAIL = #mail#, MAIL_LOWER = LCASE(#mail#), LAST_UPDATE = NOW(), SN = #sn#, CN = #cn#, DESCRIPTION = #description#, TELEPHONENUMBER = #telephonenumber# WHERE id = #externalid#
